players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm the mafioso. Stay vigilant, Bob is the detective."
Diana: "Bob, we need to work together. Stay sharp and investigate wisely."
Bob: "Thanks for the info, Alice. Diana, keep an eye on Charlie."
You: "Bob, focus on Diana. Alice"
Bob: "Will do, Diana. Stay alert everyone."
Diana: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice; Charlie's death was suspicious. Diana"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

You: "Thanks for the info, Alice. Diana, keep an eye on Charlie."
Alice: "Bob, focus on Diana. Alice"
You: "Will do, Diana. Stay alert everyone."
Diana: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice; Charlie's death was suspicious. Diana"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
